description: Ukraine's capital is now among the world's most polluted cities, an international ranking shows.
title: Wildfires blanket Kyiv in thick smog
title_page: Wildfires blanket Kyiv in thick smog - BBC News
maintext: Firefighters have been tackling wildfires in the Chernobyl zone and in areas nearer to Kyiv, and there was a new flare-up fanned by strong winds on Thursday. But the emergency services say fire has not spread to the Chernobyl power station area.
